trans-unit.source: Enable user settings:If enabled, backend users can select in the user settings which fields are available when using the "Edit all" buttons under "List" → "Localization overview". If not empty, the backend user selection overrides the TSconfig setting `tx_l10ntableextended.replaceColumnsList`.
trans-unit.target: Enable user settings:If enabled, backend users can select in the user settings which fields are available when using the "Edit all" buttons under "List" → "Localization overview". If not empty, the backend user selection overrides the TSconfig setting `tx_l10ntableextended.replaceColumnsList`.

trans-unit.source: Select which fields are available when using the "Edit all" buttons under "List" → "Localization overview".
trans-unit.target: Select which fields are available when using the "Edit all" buttons under "List" → "Localization overview".
